name: Sea To Summit Comfort Plus SI Double Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
Comfort Plus SI Double Sleeping Pad
description: You and your partner will sleep soundly with luxurious padding between you and the cold ground. The thick foam provides insulation for reliable 3 season use. And there's enough insulation for a comfortable sleep on warmer winter nights too.Quite polyester face fabric with a non-slip surface on the underside.Delta Core™ PU foam with cut-outs to reduce weight and packed size.Multi-fuctional one-way inflate valve flips over to prevent air re-entering during deflation.Includes stuff sack, repair kit, and PillowLock™ for use with Aeros™ pillows.
